entries.notes: Standardized response format and Baton context management system rollout. Completed for all 10 projects (8 successful deployments, 2 skipped). Infrastructure deployment completed 2025-12-26. Provides 25-100x token compression, multi-conversation support, and standardized 8-section response format. All active projects now have Baton system installed.

entries.notes: Phase to Infisical secrets migration complete for all projects. Infrastructure, Finance-Ingest, AppBrain, and DoughFlow migrated. entries.notes: Cross-project dependency tracking rollout. Enables automated breaking change detection and dependency awareness using GitHub CLI. Only applicable to core framework projects (Infrastructure, AppBrain). Most projects are standalone with no internal dependencies. Uses zero-context approach - Claude invokes gh commands only when needed.
